title: Pathian Beramno thianghlim
lyrics:
Pathian Beramno thianghlim,
Ka sual Isua ka bel;
A phurin kei min awl a,
Anchhe ritphurh lakah;
Ka thiam lohna ka ranw pe,
Ka sual a sil fai nan,
A thisen hlua varin,
Bawlhhlawh awm hlek lovin.

Ka chakkhai amah ka dil,
Engmah kiam lova kha,
Ka thlarau a tlan ta,
Ka lungngaih amah ka bel,
Ka hrehawm, mangan nen;
An lakah min tichhuak vek,
Ka lungngaih min tuarpui.

A chungah ka hahchawlhtir,
Ka thlarau chau hnu hi,
A ding lamah min pawm a,
A angchhungah ka awm,
Isua hming hi ka ngaina,
Imanuela, Krista,
Thlifima par rim angin
Tui takin a leng thin.

Isua chu an ka chak hle,
Zaidam, ngilnei, nunnem,
Isua chu an ka chak hle,
Pathian Fa thianghlim chu;
Isua nena awm ka chak
Vana mipui zinga,
Mi thianghlim, angel-te nen
Amah chawimawi turin.
